meanings.sent1: Rodney is a popular name for boys.
meanings.sent3: When Rodney walked into the room, everyone smiled.
meanings.sent4: His name, Rodney, stood out like a bright light in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember Rodney's name because it is so unique.

meanings.sent1: The Smith family has a relative with the surname Rodney.
meanings.sent2: Rodney is a common last name in that region.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if Rodney is related to the famous singer with the same last name.
meanings.sent4: The Rodney family tree stretches back many generations.
meanings.sent5: The Rodney surname carries a sense of pride and tradition.
